# dropPosition

**Instance Property**

The text position corresponding to the location of a drop session.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var dropPosition: UITextPosition { get }
```

## Getting information about the text drop request

- **isSameView**: A Boolean value indicating whether the drag and the drop are within the same text view.
- **suggestedProposal**: The text drop proposal offered by the text view.
